text: You find yourself in a dimly lit laboratory, surrounded by strange machines and glowing vials. Your head throbs as you try to remember how you got here.

choices.text: Examine the nearby computer terminal.
Investigate the glowing vials.
Try to leave the laboratory.

text: The computer terminal flickers to life as you approach. It displays a warning message about a containment breach in Sector 7.

choices.text: Access more information about the breach.
Ignore the warning and look for personal files.

text: As you approach the vials, you notice they're labeled with complex formulas. One vial pulses with an otherworldly blue light.

choices.text: Drink the glowing blue liquid.
Pocket the vial for later.
Leave the vials alone and check the computer.

text: You find the laboratory door locked. A keypad next to it requires a 4-digit code.

choices.text: Try to guess the code.
Look around for clues to the code.
Go back and examine the computer terminal.

text: The breach details reveal an experiment gone wrong. A genetically modified creature has escaped and is loose in the facility.

choices.text: Search for information on how to contain the creature.
Look for evacuation protocols.

text: You find personnel files. One catches your eye - it's your own, but the details don't match your memories.

choices.text: Read more about your supposed history.

text: The liquid burns as it goes down. Suddenly, your mind clears and you remember everything. You're a test subject in a secret government program.

choices.text: Use your newfound clarity to plan an escape.
Confront the scientists responsible.

text: You carefully pocket the vial. As you do, an alarm blares through the facility.

choices.text: Hide and wait for the alarm to stop.
Use the distraction to try escaping.

text: After several attempts, the keypad flashes red and locks down. You hear footsteps approaching.

choices.text: Hide quickly.
Prepare to confront whoever is coming.

text: You notice a sticky note under the computer monitor with the numbers 2-7-3-9 written on it.

choices.text: Try this code on the door.
Check the computer for more information first.

text: The containment protocols involve luring the creature to the cryogenic chamber in Sector 9.

choices.text: Head to Sector 9 to prepare the trap.
Look for a weapon to defend yourself first.

text: The evacuation protocols are clear: all personnel must report to the helipad on the roof immediately.

choices.text: Follow the evacuation protocol.
Ignore it and continue investigating.

text: According to the file, you volunteered for a memory alteration experiment. The success rate was only 15%.

choices.text: Try to recall your true memories.
Look for more information about the experiment.

text: With your enhanced mental clarity, you quickly formulate an escape plan involving the ventilation system.

choices.text: Execute your escape plan.

text: You make your way to the main research lab, determined to find answers.

choices.text: Demand answers from the lead scientist.
Secretly observe the scientists at work.

text: You hide in a supply closet. Through the door, you overhear scientists discussing a 'Phase 2' of the experiment.

choices.text: Continue listening.
Sneak out and explore while they're distracted.

text: In the chaos of the alarm, you manage to slip into a restricted area. You find yourself in a room full of cryogenic pods.

choices.text: Examine the pods closer.
Look for an exit.

text: You quickly duck behind some large equipment. A security guard enters, looks around, then leaves.

choices.text: Wait a bit longer, then try the door again.
Follow the guard discreetly.

text: As you prepare to confront the newcomer, a security guard enters. He looks surprised to see you.

choices.text: Try to bluff your way past him.
Attempt to overpower the guard.

text: The code works! The door slides open, revealing a long, sterile corridor.

choices.text: Explore the corridor to the left.
Explore the corridor to the right.

text: You reach Sector 9 and find the cryogenic chamber. A control panel nearby seems to operate it.

choices.text: Attempt to activate the chamber.
Set up an ambush for the creature.

text: You find a weapons locker, but it's locked with a biometric scanner.

choices.text: Look for a way to bypass the scanner.
Give up and head to Sector 9 unarmed.

text: You follow the signs to the roof. As you reach the helipad, you see a helicopter preparing for takeoff.

choices.text: Run to catch the helicopter.
Hide and observe the situation.

text: Ignoring the evacuation order, you continue exploring. You stumble upon a hidden room filled with advanced technology.

choices.text: Investigate the strange machines.

text: As you concentrate, flashes of memory return. You remember volunteering for the experiment to save someone important to you.

choices.text: Try to remember who you were trying to save.
Focus on remembering the details of the experiment.
